snippet: The world’s oldest international soccer championship was nearly derailed by the FIFA corruption scandal.
abstract: Concacaf officials confirm that Copa America Centenario soccer tournament will be held in United States in 2016, as scheduled, despite problems that arose with FIFA corruption scandal.
